com.bigdata.counters

Class ActiveProcess

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bigdata.counters.ActiveProcess

  • public class ActiveProcess
extends Object
    Command manages the execution and termination of a native process and an object reading the output of that process.
    Version:
    $Id$
    Author:
    Bryan Thompson
